text: We do not support React 19 at this time

Are we able to use cms-react components inside a react component, as long as the module using the react component manages the fields and passes any needed props to the cms-react component?
Ex:
• Using crs-react `Form/>` inside a react component `<BiggerForm/>`
• Using `<BiggerForm/>`  in a `<Hero/>` module
• `<Hero/>` uses the form’s FormField and then passes anything needed down to `<BiggerForm/>` which passes it down to `<Form>`. 
My understanding is that `<Form/>` only needs the field name and cms-react does some behind the scenes magic.
It seems to have fixed itself:man-shrugging::skin-tone-2: It works now, but thank you

Is there an example of `<ImageField>` (<https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/field-types/type-aliases/type-alias.ImageFieldType.html|link>) being used anywhere in the docs or example repo? I'm at a loss for how to use `size_type` or `responsive` to generate srcset or responsive images in my custom React components. Thank you!
